name: sprintly-ui
title: Sprintly UI
description: A React-based UI kit for building Sprintly interfaces

scripts.prepublish: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run build-min-less
scripts.build-min: browserify src/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] | uglifyjs -cm > dist/js/sprintly-ui.min.js
scripts.build-min-less: npm run build-less && cat dist/css/sprintly-ui.css | csso -o dist/css/sprintly-ui.min.css
scripts.watch: watchify src/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o 'node_modules/.bin/exorcist dist/js/sprintly-ui.js.map > dist/js/sprintly-ui.js' -d -v
scripts.build-test: browserify test/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -t [ istanbulify --ignore [ **/node_modules/** **/test/** ] ] -d | node_modules/.bin/exorcist test/build.js.map > test/build.js
scripts.watch-test: watchify test/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -t [ istanbulify --ignore [ **/node_modules/** **/test/** ] ] -o 'node_modules/.bin/exorcist test/build.js.map > test/build.js' -d -v
scripts.coverage: gulp test-coverage && istanbul report --root coverage lcov && mv coverage/ test/

author: Sprintly Team (http://sprint.ly/)
